lead_paragraph: Victoria Azarenka said she was modeling her improved footwork on Novak Djokovic after beginning her quest for a third Australian Open title with a 6-0 6-0 drubbing of Belgian Alison Van Uytvanck on Tuesday.
snippet: Victoria Azarenka said she was modeling her improved footwork on Novak Djokovic after beginning her quest for a third Australian Open title with a 6-0 6-0 drubbing of Belgian Alison Van Uytvanck on Tuesday....

headline.main: Impressive Azarenka Wants to Move Like Djokovic
headline.print_headline: Impressive Azarenka Wants to Move Like Djokovic
